EPISODE 1: KATABASIS Sep 21, 2022 The first episode of our series exploring a new model of depression. The first half is a bit of an introduction to what exactly I'm trying to do with this series—then, we get into a brief discussion of Carl Jung. Works referenced in this episode include Dante's Inferno, The Red Book (C.G. Jung), and Catafalque (Peter Kingsley). This is the first of two free episodes.
